title: Pixel 3a phone is not charging. Tried different chargers, cables etc. Need Reapir center address.
content:
Pixel 3a not charging. Tried different chargers and cables. Tried resetting the device and factory reset. some problem in charging or some circuit broken looks like. 
I couldnt find any Authorized service center in Hyderabad or India for Pixel 3a device. please help.
